scripts.postrelease: lerna exec --no-bail --no-private --no-sort --stream -- '[ -n "$(npm v . dist-tags.latest)" ] && npm dist-tag add ${LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME}@$(npm v . dist-tags.latest) volar-2.2'
